item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:1, topic:164500”]can you have this on a command?

removeSkillXP(14000000, 7); removeSkillXP(14000000, 8); removeSkillXP(14000000, 9);

instead of

addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9);[/quote]

If you make a removeSkillXP Method.
